timeline.message:
Added Upgrade Value Prop on EnrolledCourses + locked content
- LEARNER-8026, 8111
- Added Value prop layout on My Courses card
- Added Value prop modal
- Added Firebase Remote config for value prop
- Added locked content on assignments for audit mode
- Added Analytics events for Value prop

timeline.body: Unsed method.
timeline.bodyText: Unsed method.
timeline.bodyHTML: Unsed method.
timeline.author: farhan-arshad-dev
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -467,6 +467,37 @@ void trackPLSShiftButtonTapped(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String enrollm
     void trackPLSCourseDatesShift(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String enrollmentMode,
                                   @NonNull String screenName, boolean isSuccess);
 
+    /**
+     * Track the Value Prop Modal appearance
+     *
+     * @param courseId     course id of the course through which the modal is appeared
+     * @param assignmentId Assignment id of course unit
+     * @param screenName   The screen name through which Modal will appear
+     */
+    void trackValuePropModalView(@NonNull String courseId, @Nullable String assignmentId,
+                                 @NonNull String screenName);
+
+
+    /**
+     * Track the Value Prop Learn more button tapped
+     *
+     * @param courseId     course id of the course on which button is tapped
+     * @param assignmentId Assignment id of course unit
+     * @param screenName   The screen name on which button will be tapped
+     */
+    void trackValuePropLearnMoreTapped(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String assignmentId,
+                                       @NonNull String screenName);
+
+
+    /**
+     * Track the tapped occurrence on locked content
+     *
+     * @param courseId     course id of the course on which button is tapped
+     * @param assignmentId Assignment id of course unit
+     */
+    void trackLockedContentTapped(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String assignmentId);

timeline.body:
In the case of DashBoard type, Modal ASSIGNMENT_ID will be `null|empty`. In that case, the app should not send empty data.

FYI @mumer92.
timeline.bodyText:
In the case of DashBoard type, Modal ASSIGNMENT_ID will be null|empty. In that case, the app should not send empty data.
FYI @mumer92.

@farhan
Yes, when ASSIGNMENT_ID is not available, we are not sending it. Doing same on iOS.
replies.author: mumer92

timeline.body:
In the case of DashBoard type, Modal ASSIGNMENT_ID will be `null|empty`. In that case, the app should not send empty data.

FYI @mumer92.

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
Replace "__" with "_" for FirebaseAnalytics - LEARNER-8142 - Added AnalyticsUtils.kt - Added AnalyticsUtilsTest.kt

Implement Upgrade Value Prop on Subsection and Unit Detail Screen - LEARNER-8028 - Update subsection of course unit - Added Value prop on course unit detail screen - Added Analytics for value prop on subsection - Added style for primary action button
Add "Explore All Courses" on landing screen - LEARNER-8213 - Update searchbar hint to "Search our 3000+ courses" - Add analytics events for explore all courses
Analytics added on CourseDatesPageFragment.kt for component tapped - LEARNER-8231 - Analytics added for all the supported/unsupported components tapped

Celebratory Modal for Course Section Completion - LEARNER-7946 - Gif support for celebration image. - Landscape mode support celebration dialog. - Tablet screen design support for celebration modal. - Custome social sharing popup menu. - Implement analytics for celebration modal.
Added Screen events for My_Programs & Account_Settings - LEARNER-8273 - LEARNER-8274
Added Analytics events for Resume Course - LEARNER-8269
Merge pull request #1529 from edx/omer/LEARNER-8269

feat: allow specialExam xBlock to open through `View on Web` - LEARNER-8311 - Allow Unsupported xBlocks with prerequisite can be open in webview - Non-supported xblocks can now be open through `View on Web` - Added Analytics to track the events BREAKING CHANGE: added support to handle SpecialExam xBlock

feat: add self-paced course dates events in calendar. - Add CTA (switch) with "add to calendar" message on the Course Dates page. - Show/Hide the message and CTA in the exist of Remote flags. - Ask user access read/write permission for calendar to perform CRUD operations. - Added course dates as events to the local mobile app calendar for every course separately. - Added analytics of the desired events fix: LEARNER-8320, LEARNER-8381

feat: update calendar events on shift dates - Update Calendar events if user press `shift due dates` anywhere inside the app - Add an alert to ask user whether to update or remove calendar - Added respective analytics events - Handle courseDates API call to store it's response locally fix: LEARNER-8380
chore: open in browser analytics (#1563)

feat: add remove calendar consent screen - Added an alert dialog to ask user confirmation before removing calendar - Update the Add calendar confirmation Dialog every time user wants to sync on - Added respective Analytics fix: LEARNER-8490

chore: added UI changes to support for IAP - Modify the Value Prop for IAP - Remove unused files and code related to Value prop - Embedded the the upgrading benefits in locked content unit - Animate Embedded view on tapping show more/less - Added analytics for the respective events BREAKING CHANGE: `IAP_ENABLED` key in config file is now used for IAP_Feature enable fix: LEARNER-8468, 8427, 8469, 8491
Merge pull request #1569 from edx/omer/LEARNER-8468

feat: implement new Profile Screen - Update AccountFragment.kt according to new Profile Screen - Update deeplink support according new App Nav - Added Fields behind feature flags - Remove unused code - Update Screenshot test cases - Added respective Analytics fix: LEARNER-8438
feat: Add Video Download Qualities option (#1583)
feat: Delete Account option from profile screen

feat: Add an alertDialog loader on creating/updating events - Add AlertDialog Loader while creating/updating events - Add one 1 sec pause to avoid flickering if creating/updating event takes less than 1 sec - User ViewModelScope to handle thread in the background - Update the analytics accordingly fix: LEARNER-8542
feat: Add an activation opt-in/opt-out checkbox in registration form

feat: Add Analytics for In App Purchases - Add Singleton class to log IAP events - Track all the required times and events - Updated error message for failure cases - Update BillingProcessor.kt fix: LEARNER-8826
feat: Discover experience as a full webview (#1663)
chore: Add Analytics for OpenInBrowser new Discovery Experience - Add analytics for alert opening and alert action taken - Update file name strings_v2.xml to strings_2.xml fix: LEARNER-8871
fix: `Find a Course` Analytics for new Discovery experience
chore: add SDN prompt shows whenever a user clicks on the upgrade CTA (#1695)
chore: Add title and message for SDN dialog prompt (#1707)

chore: Add analytics to track experiment groups - Update `trackValuePropModalView` method trackEvent to screenEvent - Add method `trackValuePropMessageViewed` to track experiment groups - Log `trackValuePropModalView` event from CourseUnitMobileNotSupportedFragment.kt - update the IAP flag on MyCoursesListFragment.kt fix: LEARNER-9030
feat: remove SDN attestation pop-up
refactor: update in-app purchases code structure
feat: Add analytics for unfulfilled purchases
feat: Add Project OneTrust in Profile screen (#1738)
